params.6:
2x restore rate for all stats
except Hitpoints and Prayer.
params.8: Keep 1 extra item if you die.
params.15:
Inflicts damage to nearby
targets if you die.
params.16:
Heals you when damaged
and health falls
below 10%.
params.17:
1/4 of damage dealt is
also removed from
opponent's Prayer.
params.19: Increases your magical attack and defence by 5%.
params.21: Increases your magical attack and defence by 10%.
params.23: Increases your magical attack and defence by 15%.
params.25: Increases your defence by 20%, strength by 18%, and attack by 15%.
params.26: Increases your defence by 25%, strength by 23%, and attack by 20%.
params.24: Increases your ranged attack by 20% and damage by 23%, and your defence by 25%.
params.27: Increases your magical attack and defence by 25%, and your defence by 25%.
